pr_title: Required for Hibernate Reactive for queries support

timeline.message:
Change scope of various private methods to protected

  So that Hibernate Reactive can reuse them.

timeline.bodyText: @DavideD I'm not a big fan of this. I think it might be better to add a getQueryPlanCache() accessor to SessionFactoryImpl and override it on the subclass.
timeline.author: gavinking

replies.bodyText: (You're passing a reference to a partially-uninitialized object to an arbitrary function. The subclass constructor hasn't been called at this point.)
replies.author: gavinking

replies.bodyText: And note: you're using a function ref here precisely because you want to circumvent the JVM's restriction which is designed to prevent you doing exactly what you're doing here :-)
replies.author: gavinking

replies.bodyText: You got me :) OK, I will change it
replies.author: DavideD

timeline.bodyText:
Are you guys really using inheritance everywhere?  You really want to subclass all of these?  Why not just pass in functionals that can create the plan?  Then your SessionFactory (I assume you already subclass SessionFactory, Session, etc) can simply pass in a different one.
I mean, feel free to keep subclassing everything, but personally I'd be trying to minimize what I need to subclass
timeline.author: sebersole

replies.bodyText:
@sebersole the new subclass RxHQLQueryPlan actually adds new public operations, it's not just overriding operations of HQLQueryPlan.
On the other hand, perhaps you're right about RxQueryPlanCache: I now notice we could probably eliminate that class and replace it by a new argument to QueryPlanCache. @DavideD do you want me to try and make that change?
replies.author: gavinking

replies.bodyText: I think I can take care of it. Let me give it a go.
replies.author: DavideD

replies.bodyText: @DavideD can I push to your branch?
replies.author: gavinking

replies.bodyText: You are talking about adding a function for the creation of the QueryPlanCache, isn't it? Can I add a new getHQLQueryPlan with this additional argument? Or do  need to keep the API of QueryPlanCache the same?
replies.author: DavideD

replies.bodyText: OK, push it on the branch. No problem
replies.author: DavideD

replies.bodyText:
@DavideD do I have permission?
Authentication failed for 'https://github.com/DavideD/hibernate-orm.git/'
replies.author: gavinking

replies.bodyText: And the corresponding change to your patch to hibernate-reactive is gavinking/hibernate-reactive@2f3d48f
replies.author: gavinking

replies.bodyText: I've updated both PRs. I've squashed the commits in the Hibernate Reactive one
replies.author: DavideD

timeline.message: HHH-14024 Allow the creation of a different QueryPlan
HHH-14027 Allow the creation of a different QueryLoader
HHH-14024 Allow the creation of a different QueryPlanCache

HHH-14028 Change scope of various private methods to protected

  So that Hibernate Reactive can reuse them.
HHH-14025 Add method to return the query statements for update queries
HHH-14026 Change scope to protected for SessionImple#verifyImmutableEntityUpdate

HHH-14024 add QueryPlanCreator functional interface

simplifies customization of HQLQueryPlan instantiation

HHH-14024 add QueryPlanCreator functional interface

simplifies customization of HQLQueryPlan instantiation
